page.title: 14Entertainment and Recreation
page.content: EAST GRINSTEAD has a wide variety of entertainment and recreational facilities which cater for virtually every taste and in addition there is a very large number of clubs and societies which draw together people with special interests from all age groups. The town has a large 3 screen cinema which shows a wide range of films shortly after their London premier.There is also the 330 seat Adeline Genee Theatre which was opened in 1967.It has a policy of presenting mixed variety entertainment with an emphasis on dance.In addition four different productions a year are staged by the "Friends of the Genee", auditions for parts are open to everyone.
